meanings.definition: A person or thing that retracts or withdraws something.
meanings.sent1: The retractors of the curtains made the room dark.
meanings.sent2: The retractor of the statement caused confusion.
meanings.sent3: The retractors of the apology were insincere.
meanings.sent4: His retractors of support left him feeling alone.
meanings.sent5: The retractors of the bridge made it collapse.

meanings.definition: Surgical instruments used to hold back organs or tissues during surgery.
meanings.sent1: The surgeon used retractors to keep the area clear.
meanings.sent2: The retractors helped in the successful completion of the surgery.
meanings.sent3: The retractors played a vital role in the medical drama.
meanings.sent4: Her precision with the retractors was like a skilled artist.
meanings.sent5: The retractors gleamed under the bright lights of the operating room.
